website_summaries.verdict: A 10 minute exfoliating facial treatment that combats blemishes and boosts overall skin texture.
pros: Glycolic, lactic, and salicylic acid exfoliate outer layers of skin as well as deep inside pores to reveal a clearer, more radiant complexion

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for a couple of days & noticed it lathers very well but doesn't dry out my skin & no tightness. I really like this line of products so decided to try the facial wash . . .a little bit goes a long way. Easy pump for travel purpose too.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakout prone, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this cleanser from my cosmetic doctor. I have normal to oily in the t-zone area skin which tends to break out, and this cleaner has helped with my breakouts (contains salicylic acid), it contains papaya making it effective but not too harsh! I use it twice a day and have experienced no irritation. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: juan jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: True to my skin
customer_reviews.text: My face has never felt cleaner with just a wash. Seriously good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: It is very good at getting rid of my oiliness
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a difference. It is very good at getting rid of my oiliness. This product makes my skin fresh and clean. It is safe and gentle to use everyday. Almost no fragrance at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anonimous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product that clears up your skin fast and keeps it clear
customer_reviews.author: Forever Yours

customer_reviews.title: Brighter skin
customer_reviews.text: I started using this products 3 months ago and I can see a change in my skin... totally recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: it leaves my skin very clean and love that is natural
customer_reviews.text: I have used several cleansers for my skin, some of them irritate my skin. I feel this product is different, it leaves my skin very clean and love that is natural.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It has helped with acne for a teen boy and continues to help my skin stay clear.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfy with skin care cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfy with skin care cleanser, it keeps my skin smoth with no irritation and after using other brands I found it very good best product so far.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have a good experience with this purchase. I am on my second bottle. I really like the way the cleanser lathers. With wearing makeup it can be tough at times to break down all the oils and dirt. So I think it does a really good job doing that. Also, I get flaky skin daily, which means the acid is doing it job removing all the dead skin cells. And of course I like that it targets aging and acne at the same time. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Goodin Oksana

customer_reviews.title: This is the best face wash I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face wash I’ve ever used. I can use it twice a day without worrying about over drying or anything like that. love it made my face fresh
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

product_meta.title: GloxiniaLife by Dr. Calle Enzyme Cleanser- Face Cleanser for Acne, Oily, and Dry Skin with Salicylic Acid-For Men and Women- Facial Exfoliating, Unclogs Pores, Fights Blackheads, Anti Aging, 7.1 oz
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL, MEDICAL GRADE GLOXINIALIFE BY DR. CALLE ENZYME CLEANSER; hydrating facial cleanser provides antioxidant protection benefit; ideal for both acne and aging skin regimens; treatment kills acne bacteria & helps prevent breakouts
CLEANS DEEP DOWN TO THE PORES; remains gentle enough for twice-daily use
EXFOLIATING BLEND WITH BOTANICAL EXTRACTS; exfoliates skin to encourage the healthy production of new cells
GENTLE ENOUGH; formulated free of sulfates, parabens, artificial dyes, and fragrances

MANUFACTURED IN USA IN FDA REGULATED FACILITY; medical grade Gloxinialife by Dr. Calle Enzyme Cleanser comes with 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. If you aren't completely satisfied with your results, simply return the products to us within 60 days for a full refund!
